decision.notes: Number of elements for iterations of FCS_HTTPS_EXT.1

f-element.title: The application shall implement the HTTPS protocol that complies with RFC 2818.

aactivity.TSS: The evaluator shall examine the TSS and determine that enough detail is provided to explain how the implementation complies with RFC 2818.
aactivity.Tests: The evaluator shall attempt to establish an HTTPS connection to the TOE using a client, observe the traffic with a packet analyzer, and verify that the connection succeeds and that the traffic is identified as TLS or HTTPS.

f-element.title: The application shall implement HTTPS using TLS as defined in the Functional Package for TLS.

aactivity.Tests: Other tests are performed in conjunction with the TLS package.

f-element.title:
The application shall
not process peer certificates
not establish the user and not establish the application-initiated connection notify the user and not establish user-initiated connection notify the user and request authorization to establish the user-initiated connection
if the peer certificate is deemed invalid.

aactivity.Tests: Other tests are performed in conjunction with the TLS Functional Package, FCS_HTTPS_EXT.2 (dependent on selections in FTP_DIT_EXT.1), and FIA_X509_EXT.1).
